links.*: The Lord of the Rings (1956 radio series)

wikitext.*:
'''Terence Rogers Tiller''' ([[19 September|September 19]], [[1916]] - [[24 December|December 24]], [[1987]]) was an English poet and radio producer. He adapted ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' for a [[The Lord of the Rings (1956 radio series)|radio series]] in [[1955]], which [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] did not like very much, as read in [[The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien|Letters]] [[Letter 175|175]], [[Letter 176|176]], [[Letter 177|177]], [[Letter 194|194]] and [[Letter 198|198]].
